title: Week 9 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 9th week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, July 19th, 2021. 

## ETHEREUM POOLS
Remove 2x Tier 4 slot allocations for BAL/WETH 80/20. The pool will now receive 30,000 BAL per week total.

https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x5c6ee304399dbdb9c8ef030ab642b10820db8f56000200000000000000000014

Allocate a Tier 4 slot to UMA/USDC 50/50. This pool will now receive 1,000 BAL per week total.

https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0xf5aaf7ee8c39b651cebf5f1f50c10631e78e0ef9000200000000000000000069

Allocate a Tier 4 slot to GRT/USDC 50/50. This pool will now receive 1,000 BAL per week total.

https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x14462305d211c12a736986f4e8216e28c5ea7ab4000200000000000000000068



## POLYGON POOLS

Remove a Tier 4 slot for 1,000 BAL from SUSHI/WMATIC/USDC/QI/WETH/QUICK/BAL/ADDY. This pool will now receive 0 BAL per week total. 

https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x32fc95287b14eaef3afa92cccc48c285ee3a280a000100000000000000000005


Allocate a Tier 4 slot for 1,000 BAL to renBTC/WBTC. This pool will now receive 1,000 BAL per week total.

https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0xfeadd389a5c427952d8fdb8057d6c8ba1156cc5600020000000000000000001e

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/576
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
